page.title: 02Leisure in Coolham/Shipley
page.content: { LEISURE Survey to show how people use leisure time. 49 replies received. GARDENING 92% TELEVISION VIEWING 57% DO IT YOURSELF 31% SPORT (SPECTATORS) 24% SPORT (PARTICIPATION) 20% BINGO/WHIST 8% 31% belong to library/bookclub. Minority pursuits (<3%) include wine production, hunting/riding & fishing. { RELIGION } CHURCH OF ENGLAND 60% CATHOLIC 8% NONE 20% { USE OF LOCAL AMENITIES 75% used the GARAGE 67% used the POST OFFICE 55% used the SHOP 53% used the PUBS 17% used POWELL'S ANIMAL FEEDS 6% used the PUBLIC TELEPHONE.{
